text: It doesn ’ t have to be a Saturday night to put Elton John in a fighting mood and he proved that on Thursday when he took issue with a “ handsy ” fan and stormed off stage mid - concert. Sir Elton was performing his classic song “ Saturday Night ’ s Alright ” during his Las Vegas residency, and as per tradition, he invited a group of fans up to the stage to gather around the piano while he played. Everyone seemed to be having a good time until an overzealous fan reached over to touch the singer as he was singing the 1973 hit.
